data.text: “Nanso mprempren wɔserew me,
Mfaso bɛn na wɔn nsa mu ahoɔden wɔ ma me,
Ohia ne ɔkɔm ama wɔn ho atetew,
Wɔboaboaa nkyenhaban ano wɔ nkyɛkyerɛ mu,
Wɔn mfɛfo pam wɔn fii wɔn mu,
Wɔhyɛɛ wɔn ma wɔtenaa suka a emu awo,
wosuu sɛ mfurum wɔ wuram
Kuw a wɔmfra na wonni din,
“Na nnɛ yi wɔn mmabarima de dwom bɔ me akutia;
Wokyi me na wontwiw mmɛn me;
Afei a Onyankopɔn abubu me tadua na ɔde amanehunu aba me so yi,
Abusuakuw no tow hyɛ me so wɔ me nifa so;
Wosisiw mʼakwan;
Wɔba te sɛ nea wofi ntokuru a ano abae mu;
Ahunahuna ma me ho dwiriw me;
“Na mprempren, me nkwa resa;
Anadwo wowɔ me nnompe mu;
Onyankopɔn fi ne tumi mu yɛ sɛ adurade ma me;
Ɔtow me kyene dontori mu
“Onyankopɔn, misu mefrɛ wo, nanso wummua me.
Woba me so anibere so;
Wuhwim me na wode mframa pia me;
Minim sɛ wode me bɛkɔ owu mu,
“Ampa ara obiara mfa ne nsa nka onipa a ɔrebrɛ
Mansu amma wɔn a wɔwɔ ɔhaw mu ana?
Nanso bere a mʼani da papa so no, bɔne bae;
Me yafunu mu a ɛwowɔ me no nnyae da;
Menenam a mabiri, nanso ɛnyɛ sɛ owia na ahyew me;
Madan nnompo nuabarima,
Me honam ani biri na ehuanhuan;
Me sanku bɔ kwadwom,
